name: Cynthia M. MALESKI, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, in her capacity as Statutory Liquidator of World Life and Health Insurance Company of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. WORLCO CAPITAL GROUP, LTD., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Maleski v. Worlco Capital Group, Ltd.

parties: Cynthia M. MALESKI, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, in her capacity as Statutory Liquidator of World Life and Health Insurance Company of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. WORLCO CAPITAL GROUP, LTD., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of July, 1996, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
679 A.2d 1264
Cynthia M. MALESKI, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, in her capacity as Statutory Liquidator of World Life and Health Insurance Company of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. WORLCO CAPITAL GROUP, LTD., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 26, 1996.
